name: ORS NOMIS Business Data User Update Report
description:
This report lists the changes carried out by the selected NOMIS user made in a specified period. The report prompts for the name of a NOMIS user and the from and to dates of the reporting period. Report is restricted to return Classic NOMIS records only.
CAD0007 - v00.00.07 Last Modified: 18/04/2023

dataset.name: NOMIS Business Data User Update
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.AUDIT_USER_ID, to_char(AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.AUDIT_TIMESTAMP,'HH24:MI:SS.FF3'), AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.AUDIT_MODULE_NAME, AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.LCR_COMMAND_TYPE, AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.AUDIT_CLIENT_USER_ID, AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.AUDIT_CLIENT_IP_ADDRESS, AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.AUDIT_CLIENT_WORKSTATION_NAME, AUDITREF.STAFF_MEMBERS.LAST_NAME, AUDITREF.STAFF_MEMBERS.FIRST_NAME, nvl(AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.USERNAME,'N/A'), nvl(AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.STAFF_USER_TYPE,'N/A'), AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.WORKING_CASELOAD_ID, trunc(AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.AUDIT_TIMESTAMP), AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.LCR_OBJECT_NAME, AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.AUDIT_TABLE_SEQ, ALL_AUDIT_COLUMN.LCR_COLUMN_NAME, CASE ALL_AUDIT_COLUMN.LCR_COLUMN_OLD_NEW_IND WHEN '1' THEN 'New Value' ELSE 'Old Value' END, auditdata.getrefdata(ALL_AUDIT_COLUMN.LCR_COLUMN_NAME,ALL_AUDIT_COLUMN.LCR_COLUMN_VALUE) FROM AUDITDATA.AUDIT_COLUMN ALL_AUDIT_COLUMN, AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE, AUDITREF.STAFF_MEMBERS, AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS WHERE ( AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.STAFF_ID=AUDITREF.STAFF_MEMBERS.STAFF_ID ) AND ( AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.USERNAME=AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.AUDIT_USER_ID ) AND ( AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.AUDIT_TABLE_SEQ=ALL_AUDIT_COLUMN.AUDIT_TABLE_SEQ and AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.LCR_SOURCE_TIME=ALL_AUDIT_COLUMN.LCR_SOURCE_TIME ) AND ( ( AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.LCR_OBJECT_OWNER='OMS_OWNER' ) AND ( AUDITREF.STAFF_USER_ACCOUNTS.USERNAME = 'OQG84B' ) AND ( (AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.AUDIT_TIMESTAMP >= to_date('20-03-2023 00:00:00') AND AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.AUDIT_TIMESTAMP < to_date('24-03-2023 00:00:00')+1) ) AND ALL_AUDIT_COLUMN.LCR_COLUMN_NAME NOT IN ( 'create_datetime','create_user_id','modified_datetime','modified_user_id','modify_datetime','modify_user_id','modify_date' ) AND auditdata.getrefdata(ALL_AUDIT_COLUMN.LCR_COLUMN_NAME,ALL_AUDIT_COLUMN.LCR_COLUMN_VALUE) Is Not Null AND AUDITDATA.AUDIT_TABLE.AUDIT_MODULE_NAME <> 'PRISON_API' )), dataset_ AS (SELECT FROM dataset_base_)
